title: OS ISA, will they ask us to code?
content: Code as in semaphores/mutex locks etc. or are we just asked to explain the code?

comments.body: We got it for our first isa last time

There were two scheduling questions
And some coding questions, as far as I remember, not the whole code but just some snippets

Yes 

Unit 1 we had 2 scheduling questions 

Unit 2, 2 coding questions (buffer + semaphore) if I remember it correctly
